items.sentence: The man standing over there is the owner of the store.
The more careful you are, the fewer mistakes you make.
This is the book that Tom was talking about yesterday.
This is the hottest summer we have had in fifty years.
Tom was the only one who knew the safe\'s combination.
Tom unlocked the door with the key Mary had given him.
Tom was eliminated in the second round of the contest.
Tom never felt comfortable expressing his own opinion.
Tom opened the door before Mary had a chance to knock.
Tom pleaded no contest to a charge of drunken driving.
